review_title: It kept bugging out on me
one_reviews_text: Half my body would end up in the ground. It wasnt terrible as long as it worked. The bugs really are a downer and its super easy. if you hear a sound go in the other direction.

The game was actually not that bad, the thing it lacked though was intensity and honestly it to easy and beat it first try. Something that would be nice would maybe be a more difficult game mode or something.

Game seems unfinished, there is no HUD and no way of knowing when you are close to the border of the map until you run imto the invisible wall. Character can apparently only jog for 3 seconds then need to catch their breath. The only reaon i bought the game is becaue they stole the Severog charafter from Paragon. Do not buy this game. You willregret it. I played it once and theres no instructions no compass or any gps or anything so no way of knowing where the phones could possibly be until you get super close to them, i played nearly 45 minutes and couldnt find the last phone for the life of me. Do Not Buy!! youre welcome for saving you 12 bucks!
review_feedback: We are really sorry to hear that. We listen to the criticism of our players and work with them to make the best solution possible. We updated the Game (added a HUD and a way to find the Phones easier) and it is rolling out to all our users. If you aren't happy with the game, please reach out to us via KuckiVR@gmail.com

one_reviews_text: The Graphic is outstanding! And it took me a bit longer to finish the game than on other VR-Horror Games.
The game is scary. And the Graphic is awesome! Just the gameplay is.,.. ok.
review_feedback: We are happy to hear that.
